meanings.definition: A schedule or plan that lists events or tasks in chronological order.
meanings.sent1: I always check the timetables to know when my classes are.
meanings.sent2: The train station displays the timetables for all the departing trains.
meanings.sent3: The timetables for the school play were so detailed, they even included snack breaks!
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of timetables, each minute planned out in advance.
meanings.sent5: The timetables for the conference were color-coded to make it easier to follow.

meanings.definition: A chart or diagram showing the times at which events or activities are scheduled to take place.
meanings.sent1: The timetables at the airport helped me find my gate quickly.
meanings.sent2: She referred to the timetables to see when the next bus would arrive.
meanings.sent3: The timetables for the dance competition looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a complex set of timetables, always planning ahead.
meanings.sent5: The timetables for the music festival were so detailed, they even included bathroom breaks.
